description: Led a team of developers, managing day-to-day workflows and team rituals such as stand-ups and retrospectives.
Coordinated cross-functional globally distributed teams, fostering collaboration among developers, designers, and marketers.
Leveraged data and analytics to track project performance, monitor key metrics, and drive informed decision-making.
Achieved a 4x reduction in deployment time and significantly improved speed and enhancing user experience globally and operational efficiency.
Facilitated cross-team collaboration and transparent updates to different stakeholders across the globe.
Decreased deployment time by 10 times impacting the work of 20+ people.
Coordinated the relaunch of a complete new website and a standalone ranking tool.

Spearheaded the implementation of a new design system, unifying the look, feel, and functionality across our digital products. Enabled faster, consistent UI updates and improved collaboration between design and development teams, resulting in a more cohesive UX and streamlined workflows.
Drove 40% of new business through enhanced product sections, a new digital brand, and CRO initiatives.
Delivered 10+ product launches working with a team up to 8 people (both in-house and outsourcing).
Led reporting and analytics efforts using Chartio, Salesforce, Pardot, and GA to track KPIs, measure impact, and inform strategic adjustments.
Managed the work and rituals of a team with 5 people (SCRUM)
Collaborated with PM and Engineer team to define the roadmap and to prioritize the backlog
Conducted 100+ users interviews for product feedback and idea validation
Achieved growth rates over 100% every year
Managed a portfolio of projects and products with clients
Coordinated the design and development of several MVPs and web applications
